MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH6 postcode area of Edinburgh. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4pm due to an underground cable fault on Dalmeny Street  and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of additional work required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:37pm on 30th October 2020.
